SELECT c.id as id, c.member_id as memberId, c.user_name as memberName, c.user_nick_name as memberNickName, c.user_mobile as memberMobile, c.complain_type as complainType, c.operate_name as operateName, c.status as status, c.description as description, c.business_id as businessId, c.house_id as houseId, CONCAT( h.residential, IFNULL(h.building, '*'), '栋', IFNULL(CONCAT(h.unit, '单元'),'' ), IFNULL(h.number, '*'), '号' ) as houseName, c.files as files, c.create_date as createDate, c.modify_date as modifyDate, c.content as content, c.change_reason as changeReason, c.reject_reason as rejectReason, c.image as image FROM dj_complain c LEFT JOIN dj_house h ON c.house_id = h.id WHERE c.data_status = 0
and c.id = #{complainId}
